Tim saw a flash of lightning in the sky. He knew he had to count to see how far away the storm was. He started counting: one, two, three, four, five. Then he heard a big boom! The storm was five seconds away. Tim was excited to see the storm.
As the storm got closer, Tim counted the lightning again.
